Go hloka boikemo ga Ntshwarele.
Go boa gae ka masa; Go robala a tsoga ka madila; Go gerema le makgarebe a go fapafapana.
(a) Mosadi ge a nyetšwe ga a swanela go boela gagabo le ge a kopana le mathata. (b) Ge motho a go hloriša, o mo šikologe.
Ke go bethwa ga Kelapile.
Dikeletšo tša bobedi bja bona di thubile lapa la bana ba bona; Ya mmagoKelapile e re sehlare sa muši ke go o tlogela mola ya mmagoNtshwarele e le gore Ntshwarele a nyale mosadi yo mongwe.
Aowa. Ka gobane ge tša bogadi di thatafa o boela gagabo.
Ntshwarele o swerwe ke malwetši a thobalano; Ntshwarele o senyegetšwe ke lapa.
Go boledišana le molekane wa gagwe pele; Batho ba babedi ge ba na le mathata ba swanetše go leka go rarolla bothata bjoo pele ba ka nyaka thušo go batho ba bangwe.
Aowa. Tlholo ya ngwana ke ya batho ba babedi, e lego monna le mosadi; Ntshwarele le yena a ka no ba le bothata bja peu.
Maele a mmagoNtshwarele a senyeditše Ntshwarele lenyalo; MmagoKelapile o eletša morwedi'agwe gore ge tša bogadi di mo palela a tloge.
2023. E bontšha e le ka godimo ga diperesente tše 40.
Go tsebiša setšhaba ka dipalopalo tša barutwana ba Kreiti ya 12 bao ba ithutago Sepedi ngwaga ka ngwaga.
Bašemane ba Kreiti ya 12 ba ngwaga wa 2021 ke ba bantši go feta 2023.

structured_answer.quote: 'Se se hlola gore go be le phišo ye e tseneletšego ...'
'Ya tliša komelelo ya masetlapelo go diphedi ka bophara.'
'Komelelo e hlola mello ya hlaga ya go se laolege. '
structured_answer.summary_point: Go ba le mello ya hlaga.

structured_answer.quote: 'Phišo ye e ka tliša dipula tša maatlakadibe.'
'Dipula tše di a hlobaetša gobane di tla le meetsefula ao a hlolago tshenyo.'
structured_answer.summary_point: Tshenyo ye ntši e hlolwa ke meetsefula.

structured_answer.quote: '…letšatši le tsenelela matlalong a batho gomme la hlola malwetši a go fapafapana go swana le kankere ya letlalo.'
structured_answer.summary_point: Phišo ya letšatši e bakela batho malwetši bjalo ka kankere ya letlalo.

structured_answer.quote: 'Ditsunami le tšona di thoma go ipha maatla ka lebaka la phetogo ya leratadima.'
structured_answer.summary_point: Phetogo ya leratadima e hlola le ditsunami.

questions.marker_instruction: Kabo ya meputso: Dintlha = 7; Polelo = 3; Palomoka = 10. Ge molekwa a tsopotše dintlha tše 6 go iša go tše 7 ka ntle le go di hlaloša, ga a fiwe moputso wa polelo.
